What it is
===

Library for graphical LCDs for Python on Raspberry Pi. Creates a united interface for supported devices

Supported:
- ili9486 via SPI
- ili9325 via GPIO

It's mostly C implementation of GfxLCD library.


Install
=======

.. code-block::

    pip install gfxcili



Source

.. code-block::

    python3 setup.py build_ext -i
